original_text: At that time, it will be like this: Two men will be working in a field. God will take one man away, but he will leave the other man behind.
korean_text: 그 때에 두 사람이 밭에 있으매 한 사람은 데려가고 한 사람은 버려둠을 당할 것이요

sentences.original_text: At that time, it will be like this:
Two men will be working in a field.
God will take one man away,
but he will leave the other man behind.
